name: 12 Years a Slave
description: The true story of Solomon Northup, a free black man who is abducted and sold into slavery in the pre-Civil War United States.
Two British soldiers race against time to deliver a message that could save hundreds of lives during World War I.

name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
description: A mind-bending journey through space and time, as a spacecraft's AI system, HAL 9000, turns against its human crew.

name: 500 Days of Summer
description: A nonlinear narrative explores the highs and lows of a young man's relationship with the woman of his dreams.

name: A Beautiful Mind
description: The life of brilliant mathematician John Nash, who battles schizophrenia while making groundbreaking contributions to mathematics.

name: A Clockwork Orange
description: In a dystopian future, a violent delinquent undergoes an experimental procedure that removes his free will.

name: A Few Good Men
description: A military lawyer defends Marines accused of murder and uncovers a high-level conspiracy.

name: A Quiet Place
description: A family must survive in a world where mysterious creatures hunt by sound.

name: A Star is Born
description: A fading musician helps a young singer find fame while his own career spirals downward.

name: A Streetcar Named Desire
description: A troubled woman moves in with her sister in New Orleans and clashes with her brother-in-law.

name: Alien
description: A crew on a spaceship encounters a deadly extraterrestrial creature.

name: American Beauty
description: A suburban father's midlife crisis leads to a series of events that disrupt his seemingly perfect life.

name: Amélie
description: A whimsical waitress sets out to improve the lives of those around her in Montmartre, Paris.

name: Apocalypse Now
description: During the Vietnam War, a captain is sent on a dangerous mission to assassinate a rogue colonel.

name: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is sent to the moon Pandora on a unique mission and becomes involved in the conflict between the indigenous Na'vi people and humans.

name: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble one last time to defeat Thanos and save the universe in this epic conclusion to the Infinity Saga.

name: Back to the Future
description: A teenager travels back in time to ensure his parents' future happiness.

name: Black Panther
description: T'Challa, the Black Panther and king of Wakanda, must defend his throne and nation from new threats.

name: Blade Runner
description: In a dystopian future, a retired blade runner must track down and terminate rogue replicants.

name: Blade Runner 2049
description: A new blade runner unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos.

name: Bohemian Rhapsody
description: The story of the legendary rock band Queen and its charismatic lead singer Freddie Mercury.

name: Braveheart
description: The epic story of William Wallace, a Scottish knight who led a rebellion against English oppression.

name: Casino Royale
description: James Bond, in his first mission as 007, must stop a weapons dealer from winning a high-stakes poker tournament.

name: Coco
description: A young boy embarks on a journey to the Land of the Dead to discover his family's musical heritage.

name: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
description: A martial-arts epic about love, honor, and revenge in ancient China.

name: Die Hard
description: A New York cop battles terrorists who have taken hostages in a Los Angeles skyscraper.

name: District 9
description: An alien race is stranded on Earth, and a government agent's life is forever changed when he becomes involved with them.

name: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave joins forces with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

name: Doctor Strange
description: A brilliant but arrogant neurosurgeon seeks mystical healing and becomes the Sorcerer Supreme.

name: Donnie Darko
description: A troubled teenager encounters a mysterious rabbit figure who predicts the end of the world.

name: Drive
description: A stunt driver by day and a getaway driver by night becomes involved with a dangerous heist.

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
description: A young boy befriends an alien and helps him return to his home planet.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A man, heartbroken over a failed relationship, undergoes a procedure to erase memories of his former lover.

name: Ex Machina
description: A programmer is invited to administer the Turing test to an intelligent humanoid robot with unsettling consequences.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club as a form of male bonding and rebellion.

name: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish embarks on a journey across the ocean to find his son, who has been captured by a diver.

name: For a Few Dollars More
description: Two bounty hunters team up to track down a ruthless outlaw.

name: Forrest Gump
description: The life story of a man with low intelligence, who unwittingly influences several pivotal moments in U.S. history.

name: Full Metal Jacket
description: A group of recruits endure the hardships of Marine Corps boot camp and the horrors of the Vietnam War.

name: Gandhi
description: The life of Mahatma Gandhi, who led nonviolent resistance against British colonial rule in India.

name: Get Out
description: A young African-American man visits his white girlfriend's family, only to uncover disturbing secrets.

name: Ghostbusters
description: A group of scientists become ghost hunters to save New York City from paranormal threats.

name: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: Glengarry Glen Ross
description: Real estate salesmen engage in cutthroat competition to keep their jobs.

name: Good Will Hunting
description: A janitor at MIT, with a gift for mathematics, is discovered by a professor who helps him confront his troubled past.

name: Goodfellas
description: The rise and fall of a mob associate in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

name: Gravity
description: Two astronauts must fight for survival after their spacecraft is damaged during a spacewalk.

name: Heat
description: A dedicated detective pursues a brilliant and ruthless thief in Los Angeles.

name: Her
description: A lonely man develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

name: Inception
description: A thief enters people's dreams to steal their secrets in this mind-bending heist thriller.

name: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jewish-American soldiers plot to assassinate high-ranking German officers.

name: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole to save humanity from a dying Earth.

name: Joker
description: Follow the transformation of Arthur Fleck into the iconic Batman villain, the Joker, in this gritty character study.

name: Jurassic Park
description: A billionaire invites scientists to his island theme park filled with cloned dinosaurs, but things go terribly wrong.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
description: A former assassin embarks on a quest for revenge against her former colleagues.

name: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
description: The bride continues her quest for revenge, leading to a showdown with her former mentor.

name: La La Land
description: A struggling jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

name: Léon: The Professional
description: A hitman forms an unusual bond with a young girl who seeks his help after her family is murdered.

name: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord.

name: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss seeks revenge for his wife's murder using Polaroid photographs.

name: Moonlight
description: This coming-of-age drama explores the life of a young black man as he grapples with his identity and sexuality.

name: Mystic River
description: Three childhood friends are brought back together by a tragic event that occurred in their past.

name: No Country for Old Men
description: A hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and a suitcase full of money, setting off a violent chain of events.

name: Pan's Labyrinth
description: A young girl escapes into a fantasy world during the Spanish Civil War.

name: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family in this darkly comedic thriller.

name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
description: A charming pirate teams up with a blacksmith to rescue his kidnapped love and stop a cursed crew of undead pirates.

name: Platoon
description: A young soldier's experiences during the Vietnam War are explored as he serves in a divided platoon.

name: Predator
description: A team of commandos on a rescue mission in Central America encounter a deadly extraterrestrial hunter.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: A collection of intertwining stories involving two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: A collection of intertwining stories involving two hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits.

name: Reservoir Dogs
description: A group of criminals, assembled for a heist, suspects that one of them is an undercover cop.

name: Saving Private Ryan
description: A group of soldiers is sent on a mission to find and bring home a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: Scarface
description: A Cuban immigrant rises to power in the Miami drug trade but faces the consequences of his ruthless actions.

name: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, a businessman saves the lives of more than a thousand Jewish refugees.

name: Se7en
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

name: Seven Samurai
description: A group of farmers hire seven samurai to protect their village from bandits in this classic Japanese film.

name: Shutter Island
description: Two U.S. Marshals investigate the mysterious disappearance of a prisoner from a mental institution.

name: Silver Linings Playbook
description: Two troubled individuals find solace and love in each other as they navigate their respective mental health challenges.

name: Sin City
description: A series of interconnected stories in a dark and violent city.

name: Spirited Away
description: A young girl must navigate a mysterious and magical world to rescue her parents.

name: Spotlight
description: A team of journalists at The Boston Globe investigates allegations of child abuse within the Catholic Church.

name: Taxi Driver
description: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran becomes a taxi driver and descends into madness.

name: The Big Lebowski
description: A slacker gets caught up in a bizarre series of events after his rug is stolen.

name: The Breakfast Club
description: Five high school students from different cliques come together during Saturday detention.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet as he takes on the Joker in this epic superhero film.

name: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

name: The Exorcist
description: A mother seeks help from two priests to save her daughter from demonic possession.

name: The Godfather
description: The patriarch of a powerful mafia family transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

name: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
description: Three gunslingers search for buried Confederate gold in the American Southwest during the Civil War.

name: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: The misadventures of the eccentric staff and guests of a luxurious European hotel.

name: The Green Mile
description: A death row corrections officer discovers a mysterious inmate with miraculous healing abilities.

name: The Imitation Game
description: The true story of Alan Turing, a brilliant mathematician who helps crack the Enigma code during WWII.

name: The Intouchables
description: The unlikely friendship between a quadriplegic aristocrat and his caregiver leads to life-changing experiences for both.

name: The Irishman
description: A mob hitman recalls his involvement in the disappearance of Jimmy Hoffa in this epic crime saga.

name: The Lion King
description: A young lion cub must reclaim his throne after the murder of his father.

name: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the truth about his reality and joins a group of rebels fighting against a computer-controlled world.

name: The Pianist
description: A Polish pianist's life is upended by the Holocaust, and he struggles to survive in war-torn Warsaw.

name: The Princess Bride
description: A fairy tale adventure that includes a princess, a pirate, a giant, and true love.

name: The Revenant
description: A frontiersman fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

name: The Shape of Water
description: In a high-security government laboratory, a mute woman forms a unique bond with an amphibious creature.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men forge a deep friendship while finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Shining
description: A family's stay at a remote hotel becomes a nightmare as supernatural forces drive the father to madness.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
description: An FBI trainee seeks the help of a brilliant but insane serial killer to catch another killer on the loose.

name: The Sixth Sense
description: A child psychologist works with a young boy who claims to see and communicate with the dead.

name: The Social Network
description: A dramatized account of the creation of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

name: The Terminator
description: A cyborg assassin is sent back in time to kill the mother of the future leader of the human resistance.

name: The Theory of Everything
description: The life of renowned physicist Stephen Hawking, his love life, and his scientific achievements despite a debilitating illness.

name: The Thing
description: A group of scientists in Antarctica is terrorized by an alien organism that can mimic any living being.

name: The Truman Show
description: A man's entire life is revealed to be a television show, and he decides to escape his artificial world.

name: The Usual Suspects
description: A group of criminals is brought together for a heist, but things take a deadly turn.

name: The Witch
description: A Puritan family in 1630s New England encounters supernatural forces in the wilderness.

name: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The rise and fall of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who indulges in excessive wealth and corruption.

name: The Wrestler
description: A washed-up professional wrestler attempts a comeback while dealing with personal struggles.

name: There Will Be Blood
description: A ruthless oilman's ambition leads to conflict in early 20th-century California.

name: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
description: A mother takes matters into her own hands when local law enforcement fails to solve her daughter's murder.

name: Titanic
description: A love story unfolds on the ill-fated maiden voyage of the R.M.S. Titanic.

name: Toy Story 3
description: Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and their toy friends face uncertain futures as their owner prepares to leave for college.

name: Whiplash
description: A young drummer's relentless pursuit of perfection in his music teacher's jazz band.

name: Zootopia
description: A bunny police officer teams up with a slick con artist fox to solve a mystery in the city of Zootopia.
